Yesterday, I had the privilege of meeting with many community officials in Highlands County.
 
As we work together on issues ranging from our response to the pandemic, I am grateful to be able to count on public servants like these for their capable and caring leadership. https://t.co/91YxDpyzgo

Billions in COVID relief funds are laying dormant across the country, held hostage by red tape. 

Even in Sarasota we have plenty to distribute. I will fight in Congress to get the deadline extension our community needs.

https://t.co/TPCHSzyjJw

Honored to be with President @realDonaldTrump in Ft. Myers today!

He has fought tirelessly for Florida’s seniors, lowering healthcare costs and increasing options. We thank him for being a warrior for Medicare and helping us turn the corner to beat COVID-19. https://t.co/s3YV4Dma2N

Senate Democrats have turned ACB’s confirmation into a platform for their political attacks.

They have apparently forgotten the Ginsburg Rule. “No hints, no forecasts, no previews” on cases that may come before the Court.
 
Watch my discussion on @FoxFriendsFirst here: https://t.co/ZB5fU5LQQh

This is beginning to feel more like a hearing on the Affordable Care Act than a SCOTUS confirmation hearing.

Sounds like Senate Democrats need a reminder on what judicial independence is and how they can't harass a nominee into saying how she would rule on specific cases.

Last night, I joined @LizMacDonaldFOX to discuss the effects of COVID-19 on our immigration system and the DOJ's progress in keeping our communities safe with Operation LeGend.

Watch the full interview here. https://t.co/kyNzgVvvS6
I wish all those celebrating a healthy and spiritual Yom Kippur. May this holy day of atonement provide lasting spiritual guidance. G’mar hatimah tovah! https://t.co/QFSELJvg89

Abortion is not healthcare. I am pleased to be an original cosponsor of the Women’s Public Health and Safety Act.

This bill takes steps to remove tax dollars from the abortion-sponsoring business and gives states the choice to exclude abortion providers from Medicaid programs.

More promising news for America's farmers!

Thank you to @SecretarySonny for expanding the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program (CFAP) by $14 billion.

We owe it to the farmers and producers feeding our families as they bounce back from COVID-19.

President Trump deferred payroll taxes for most workers in order to support Americans during COVID-19.
 
I recently cosponsored the Support Workers, Families, and Social Security Act to implement similar tax relief by forgiving the owed taxes while keeping Social Security strong.

Over 1.4 million jobs were added back to our economy last month!
 
This makes August the 4th consecutive month of strong job gains during COVID-19.
 
Our country is back to work, and I look forward to seeing these numbers continue to rise. https://t.co/6zcM1SOs4W

Looking forward to welcoming @realDonaldTrump to Florida this afternoon!

Thanks to his Administration's COVID response, Florida has received over:
✔️4.4M N-95 masks
✔️1.1M surgical & procedural masks
✔️220K eye & face shields
✔️190K gowns & 1M gloves

Today we celebrate the heart of our economy, America’s workforce. Millions of jobs are coming back as our country recovers from the impact of COVID-19, making this year’s Labor Day even more special. Enjoy the holiday as we pay tribute to our nation’s workforce. Happy Labor Day! https://t.co/7nkJTLO7fw

Last week, I had the honor of meeting with the Hardee County Sheriff’s Office to thank them for working on the front lines during the COVID-19 pandemic. We are lucky to have such stellar law enforcement officers keeping our district safe. https://t.co/x9lWhg6YEy

I am proud to support this program that benefitted many Florida businesses and helped our country get back to work.

Recently I had the opportunity to question Postmaster General DeJoy about operational changes to the USPS.

The simple fact is that any changes to the USPS weren't a part of some Republican conspiracy theory to disenfranchise voters. 

I joined @mysuncoast to discuss this & more: https://t.co/9yMpWYl3tc

This is yet another step forward towards defeating this virus!

https://t.co/6XtyVBdILz

As a veteran, this is offensive. The Democrats need to get over this baseless conspiracy theory.

https://t.co/fLLUPUD3Pg

https://t.co/y2Ro2Nn0q4

Nobody should be surprised by these baseless allegations - scare tactics and conspiracy theories have become a familiar theme with the left. https://t.co/l0k7QHKC97

The latest political play from the Democrats is a conspiracy theory that Republicans are using operational changes to the USPS as a means to disenfranchise the American people.

This is dishonest, ridiculous and even dangerous. Enough of the scare tactics, Speaker Pelosi.
